verbs.description: As [ARG0: U.S. President Donald Trump] [V: left] [ARG1: the Group of Seven nations in turmoil] [ARGM-TMP: this weekend] , China ’s Xi Jinping and Russia ’s Vladimir Putin were putting on a very different show on the other side of the world .

As U.S. President Donald Trump left the Group of Seven nations in turmoil this weekend , China ’s Xi Jinping and Russia ’s Vladimir Putin [V: were] putting on a very different show on the other side of the world .

[ARGM-TMP: As U.S. President Donald Trump left the Group of Seven nations in turmoil this weekend] , [ARG0: China ’s Xi Jinping and Russia ’s Vladimir Putin] were [V: putting] on [ARG1: a very different show] [ARGM-LOC: on the other side of the world] .
